summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 CAMPAGNA T-REX 1400 R. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING 30 MPH, THE CONTACT NOTICED THAT THE BOLT THAT HELD THE OIL PAN IN PLACE WAS DAMAGED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE  MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN WAS INCLUDED IN NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V608000 (ENGINE). THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 30,000.
